name: Residence Inn Seattle Bellevue

reviews.text: We've stayed in this hotel many times with good experiences. However our stay in September 2006 was one of the worse experiences I have ever had in a hotel. I travel for business for at least 20+ nights per year and 10+ vacation nights - so get to experience a variety of hotels.
reviews.title: Shocked and Violated

likes.disliked: — Room torn up and sprayed with strong smelling carpet cleaning chemicals

reviews.title: Didn't Want to Leave
reviews.text: The hotel allowed a private cleaning service to enter our room - unsupervised - and use a large amount of powerful carpet cleaning chemicals to wet clean the carpets in our room. We received no notification that this cleaning was to take place, and never would have ok'd if we did.

reviews.title: Worth every cent
reviews.text: When we returned to our room after a busy day of work and vacationing - we found our beds covered in disheveled furniture. Yes, the cleaning crew placed the bedroom furniture on our bed so they could clean the carpet. (see photo's).

reviews.title: Wonderful hotel, quite
reviews.text: The very strong chemical smell from the carpet was overpowering, and the room had only one small window. We notified the management of the hotel, who apologized and asked how they could help. We would have asked to be moved to a different room - but with our belongings unpacked into drawers for a family of 4 including 2 toddlers - this would have further ruined our night. They provided us some fans to vent the smell - but it was so incredibly strong, that it did not fade even by the morning. We did receive a 1 (of 4) night comp of our stay (ie free).

This RI is due for an upgrade soon. It's popular, and hence, a little worn. That being said, the staff is always friendly, it's remarkably quiet, and the free breakfast is always bountiful. Appreciate the free high speed DSL too. If your working at MS in Redmond, it's a 5 min drive at best.
reviews.title: Always Friendly

reviews.text: A typical residence inn establishment, good place to stay if you have business with that big software company in Redmond (the campus is a 5 minute drive). The rooms are fairly clean and the as with other Residence Inn establishments, there's a full kitchen, living room area and a hot breakfast buffet that's included in the lodging price. There's also a pool, jacuzzi, coin laundry as well. There are several supermarkets near by so you can stock up on drinks that you can put in the full size fridge. One warning though, if you can you should book a room on the second floor because the first floor rooms get the full brunt of the noise from people going down the stairs. Otherwise since the establishment is in a quiet area, you shouldn't have problems with noise in general.
reviews.title: Good value for a long term stay

reviews.text: Overall would stay here again for the cost performance issue and especially if you are staying for more than a couple days.
reviews.title: Awesome place!

reviews.text: This was a wonderful place to stay. Very clean, and modern.
reviews.title: perfectly fine

likes.disliked: — area is boring - for business travelers

reviews.text: I would recommend this for anyone. I was there for a week of business, and was a perfect place for work, and play.
reviews.title: Spacious and clean

aka: Residence Inn Seattle Bellevue Hotel Bellevue
